name: Chilenews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A flash briefing with news from Chile local media (Cooperativa and Radio Bio Bio) translated to English with Google translator. It has local news, world news and sport news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
